EXECUTE.notes: Phase 9 complete. Added 171 contract tests in tests/test_contracts/ covering module manifests, PrinterStateProvider interface, InMemoryEventBus, NotificationDispatcher, and import boundary enforcement. Added make test-contracts target. All 171 tests pass without a container. The boundary enforcer (test_no_cross_module_imports) correctly flags new cross-module route imports while allowing legitimate model/schema/adapter/utility cross-module references. 2 pre-existing violations are tracked in KNOWN_VIOLATIONS with remediation notes. This is the final phase of the refactor.
